name: MathDash
headline: Turning Math into a Sport
description:
MathDash is an online live math-competition platform that gets students addicted to learning. Our target audience already spends thousands of hours doing math questions competitively, and we've *already* gotten the best of the best to switch to doing problems on our site - an average of 65 minutes a day among our 200 most active users, and a total of over 150,000 arithmetic questions solved in just the last week! Why? Because it is more thrilling and exciting to compete live, see yourself on a leaderboard, and improve your 'ELO' rating. 

We are USA Math Olympians, and have been the top power users on every single product marketed towards competitive math learners. What's missing is the math game that allows anyone at any level to play with math on demand and compete live at their level, whether it's in the back of an Uber or while training for a math competition.

founders.name: Daniel Sun, Founder
founders.description:
Daniel is the co-founder and CEO of MathDash.

He was a math competition champion in high school, qualifying for the Math Olympiad Summer Program, which opened doors to MIT and Jane Street. Daniel is now creating MathDash to create an online playground for math games and to get students addicted to learning.

founders.name: Akshaj Kadaveru, Founder
founders.description:
Akshaj is the co-founder and CTO of MathDash. 

He is a former serial math competition participant (two-time top-12 finisher in the ESPN nationally broadcasted MATHCOUNTS Countdown Round) who spent thousands of hours of his childhood playing an online math game. He studied CS at MIT, and built (with Daniel) a MIT class comparison site with 2000 users, a guess-the-song game with 6000 players, and worked at Gather, Jump Trading, and Wormhole Labs as a software engineer.

# Train Math Smarter+
## Training platform for math competitions with instant hints and expert coaches
Start Now >
![Identify](https://mathdash.com/assets/identify-dd7b1c78.svg)
### Contests w/ Prizes
Contests to simulate in-person competitions. Identify concepts holding you back
![graph](https://mathdash.com/assets/rating_graph-16fb983c.png)
### Improve Your Skills
Curriculum designed precisely for the contest you want to improve at
![Coach](https://mathdash.com/assets/coach-91101104.svg)
### Step-by-Step Guidance
Get instance feedback, hints, and explanations from expert coaches 
![MIT Logo](https://mathdash.com)![Harvard Logo](https://mathdash.com/assets/harvard-f63af259.png)![MAA Logo](https://mathdash.com/assets/maa-b700268c.png)![YC Logo](https://mathdash.com/assets/yc-a661cca1.svg)![Forbes Logo](https://mathdash.com/assets/forbes-4ab0bf56.png)![Google Logo](https://mathdash.com/assets/google-24dd678a.png)
# What Our Community is Saying
"MathDash has truly transformed my son's excitement towards math. The platform you guys have created makes learning enjoyable and engaging, and I thank you for providing a valuable resource for students like him"
★★★★★
-Jack, parent
"Yea I wish I had started mathdash sooner 😔"
★★★★★
-ChaitraliKA, student
"My son loves chat with you. He has very huge interest on maths now. We need to pay some extra for it."
★★★★★
-Yaoping, parent
"I can't wait until the contest"
★★★★★
-Paixiao, student
"My kids like your coaching very much, and qualified for AIME this year. I appreciate your confidence, good planning, and hard work!"
★★★★★
-Henry, parent
"I wasn't expecting this kind of personalized help, so the fact that this coaching system exists already excites me. Also, I'd love to get some recommendations for math contests to help me train"
★★★★★
-Gino, student
"I did not have good math teachers or support and now I can get access to an inclusive and encouraging environment like this one!"
★★★★★
-Varshini, student
"Sum of squares is really fun lol"
★★★★★
-Oron, 2023 MathCounts Written Champion
## 🎯 Why MathDash? 🎯
"If you want to get better at swimming, join a swim team and swim a few times a week. The best way to **really learn** math is to do problems for yourself. MathDash has curated the highest quality materials and community for you to most efficiently improve."
-Daniel, co-founder of MathDash
Learn More
## 🚀 Get Your Math Rating 🚀
Track your progress with our rating system! Compete in contests to earn and improve your rating. Your rating reflects your mathematical problem-solving ability and helps match you with appropriate challenges and competitors.
Understand Rating
## 📚 High Quality Learning Materials 📚 
MathDash has curated the highest quality materials for training and learning any mathematical concept. Visit the **[maps page](https://mathdash.com/</maps>)** to start learning, or read our carefully crafted handouts in the **[book](https://mathdash.com/</book>)**.
Start Learning
## 🏆 The 2024 Fall Season is Done! 🏆
Compete individually and in as part of a team to win exciting prizes such as a MathDash T-shirt, and receive MathDash badges to recognize your accomplishments!
View Results
# Featured Challenges
🔨
Writing more contests...
🔨
>

generated_description:
**MathDash: Turning Math into a Sport**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2024 batch, MathDash is an innovative platform reinventing math education by presenting it as a competitive sport. With a mission to get students addicted to learning math, MathDash allows users to compete in live math competitions, making practice feel more like play.

In just a short time, MathDash has attracted a dedicated community of math enthusiasts, including USA Math Olympians. The platform boasts impressive engagement metrics with its top 200 users average spending 65 minutes a day solving problems—resulting in over 150,000 arithmetic questions tackled in a single week. The thrill of live competitions, leaderboards, and ELO ratings motivates users, enabling them to challenge themselves and interact with peers in real-time.

MathDash caters to everyone from beginners to elite competitors. It's designed for flexibility: users can practice anywhere, whether it's in an Uber or during downtime, allowing them to harness the power of math competition whenever inspiration strikes. Theirs is a world where math learning transcends textbooks, creating an engaging, interactive experience.

The platform features various elements:

1. **Contests with Prizes**: Engaging competitions simulate the excitement of in-person math contests. 
2. **Training Tools Available**: A built-in training platform offers instant hints and guidance from expert coaches, complemented by a high-quality curriculum tailored to specific contests.
3. **Personalized Coaching**: Step-by-step feedback from knowledgeable mentors ensures students improve and feel supported every step of the way.
4. **Rating System**: Users can track their progress and earn ratings as they compete, helping them connect with relevant challenges and peers.

Feedback from the community highlights how MathDash has transformed enthusiasm around math. Parents appreciate that their children find joy in learning math, and students express eagerness for competitions, illustrating MathDash's impact on nurturing new math lovers.

In essence, MathDash is not just a platform; it’s a vibrant community and a movement aimed at making math fun, competitive, and universally accessible. The underlying philosophy is simple: the best way to master math is not simply through passive study but through active engagement and competition. If you’re ready to see how math can be exhilarating, explore MathDash [here](https://mathdash.com).
